ComicInfo.Summary: A brooding Spider Jerusalem turns to the one drug he knows will relieve his melancholy: television. In his altered state, the horrors of TV seem even worse than usual--especially when he sees that he's been made cuddly by the media. This issue features stories illustrated by Frank Quitely (ALL-STAR SUPERMAN), Eduardo Risso (100 BULLETS) and more!
ComicInfo.Title: Nobody Loves Me; Magical Truthsaying Bastard Spidey!; From the Mountain to the City; I Hump It Here; The Heroic Revenge Fantasy; The Ugly Paranoid Dream
